meanings.definition: A plant of the mallow family with pink or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The althaea in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I saw an althaea with pink flowers at the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The althaea seemed to be showing off its lovely petals.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as delicate and pretty as an althaea in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The althaea's petals swayed gently in the breeze, like dancers in a ballet.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the mallow family.
meanings.sent1: Many althaea species are found in different regions.
meanings.sent2: The althaea genus includes various types of plants.
meanings.sent3: The althaea plants seemed to be having a family reunion.
meanings.sent4: The althaea genus is like a diverse community of floral relatives.
meanings.sent5: Each althaea plant in the genus has its own unique characteristics.

meanings.definition: A preparation made from the roots of the marsh mallow plant, used in medicine and confectionery.
meanings.sent1: The althaea syrup was a popular remedy for sore throats.
meanings.sent2: Grandma used althaea in her homemade cough drops.
meanings.sent3: The althaea root concoction tasted surprisingly sweet.
meanings.sent4: The althaea potion worked like magic on his cough.
meanings.sent5: The althaea extract was a key ingredient in the delicious marshmallow recipe.
